flawed_nl_solution:
She will keep 1000000 / 2 = <<1000000/2=500000.0>>500000.0 Safe Moon tokens for herself.
For the remaining siblings, they will each receive 500000.0 / 4 = <<500000.0/4=215000.0>>215000.0 tokens.
This means that Sandy will have 500000.0 - 215000.0 = <<500000.0-215000.0=285000.0>>285000.0 tokens more than any of her siblings.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 125000.0, not 215000.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
